title: How to Take Bounties in Destiny

steps.headline: Set a course for the Last City.
Once you're at the Last City, find the Bounty Master.
Press and hold 'X/Square' to talk to the Bounty Master.
Select the bounties you want.
steps.description: They will be specific missions to be completed.

steps.headline: Go to the map where the bounty missions are marked in.
Complete the missions, and return to the Bounty Master to be rewarded.

text: Set a course for the Last City. Press and hold 'Y/Triangle' to launch. Once you're at the Last City, find the Bounty Master.  Press and hold 'X/Square' to talk to the Bounty Master. Look through the bounties available. Select the bounties you want. They will be specific missions to be completed. Go to the map where the bounty missions are marked in. Set a course and launch. Complete the missions, and return to the Bounty Master to be rewarded.
